name: Volas Entertainment
tag_list: mobile-content, mobile-portals, content-portals, content-aggregation, mobile-billing-solutions, content-management-system, portal-management, portal-building, on-deck-portal, off-deck-portal, on-deck, off-deck, portal, value-added-managed-service, content
overview:
Volas Entertainment specializes in providing all the technological solutions and all the rich mobile content that youâ€™ll ever need to unleash the full commercial potential of your mobile platform.

Since its inception in 2004, Volas Entertainment has grown to become a leader in mobile content services - providing an end-to-end solution for both on & off deck mobile portals. The company provides a combination of technological solutions and content related services, tailoring comprehensive mobile portal solutions for operators, content providers and media owners. Services include content aggregation, value-added managed services, content & portal management systems, video streaming & download solutions, portal management & development, mobile billing, transcoding and device & portal rendering services.

Constantly striving to lead and excel, the company continues to develop its product portfolio and enhance its content aggregation services throughout the world. Catering to more than 15 leading operators around the world and collaborating with more than 75 content & application providers, Volas provides its customers with a unique combination of leading technology, compelling content and extensive content management knowhow. We invite you to contact us to learn more about how we can help drive your mobile business to new levels.
